messages.epic.fortnite.social.meta.site_descripti: The Action Building game where you team up with other players to build massive forts and battle against hordes of monsters, all while crafting and looting in giant worlds where no two games are ever the same.
messages.epic.fortnite.social.meta.twitter_descri: The Action Building game where you team up with other players to build massive forts and battle against hordes of monsters, all while crafting and looting in giant worlds where no two games are ever the same.

messages.epic.code.redemption.success.msg: Your code has been successfully redeemed, log into Fortnite on your game device to use your reward!
messages.epic.code.redemption.success.msg.mac: We’ve noticed you are running a Mac operating system. Fortnite requires Windows to play, but you can download the launcher to play other Epic Games.
messages.epic.code.redemption.success.msg.other: Your code has been successfully redeemed, however Fortnite requires Windows, Mac, iOS or Android. You’ll be able to join the fight on a thoses operating systems.

messages.epic.fortnite.download.unavailable: Sorry, downloads are not available on this device. Please try again on a supported platform.
messages.epic.fortnite.meta.description: The living, action building game from Epic Games. Build forts, co-op, kill monsters, find loot, save the day!
messages.epic.fortnite.download.candownload: If your download failed to start, try again
messages.epic.fortnite.download.body: If your download failed to start, try again.
messages.epic.fortnite.download.mobile: Sorry, downloads are not available on iOS devices.
messages.epic.fortnite.download.mobile.heading: Awesome!
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.home.title: Don’t take shelter.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.video.p4: Lead the world's remaining Heroes in the fight to save humanity and take back the world.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.explore.title: Let’s Get Out There!
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.explore.rey1: Oh! So you’re the new Commander?
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.explore.rey3: Looks like those people out there need some help!
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.explore.p1: It’s time to explore the world, gather some supplies and start that whole "world saving" thing.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.rey1: Have a look around, we’re gonna need some materials
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.rey2: Those are wooden planks, they’re needed to create mostly everything.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.rey3: Bricks are great for making husk-resistant walls.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.rey4: You found metal! With that you can make some really strong structures.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.rey5: Oh nice! Nuts & bolts are used to create guns and traps.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.rey6: Looks like you have everything you need to build your first fort!
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.p1: Wood has all sorts of uses in the world of Fortnite. From building forts to making traps and weapons. It’s almost as good as duct tape. Almost.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.p2: Stone is a little less plentiful here, but you’ll want to look behind all the houses you can, because it’s real great for husk-resistant walls.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.p3: Nuts & bolts are the key components for most guns and traps in the world of Fortnite. You can find them in old appliances, cars, and just about anything that used to run.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.p4: Metal is the strongest building material in Fortnite. There are plenty of cars to smash here for the largest and most stout structures.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.collect.title: Time To Build!
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.build.rey2: You’ve got a few basic traps and a wood structure.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.build.rey3: This will stop some small waves of Husks, but not the the big stuff.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.build.rey5: I see you have some metal and stone in there now.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.build.rey6: Those extra traps will be a big help too… but you can do better.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.build.rey8: You have varied and upgraded building materials as well as a ton of traps and sniper perches.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.title: Defend Your Fort!
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.rey1: Sturdy walls aren’t enough to keep the monster hordes out.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.rey4: You’ll need to craft more things like this to push back the Storm.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.name: Name of Weapon/Trap
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.weapon1: When you’re ready for action, the Breacher is what you need to lay down suppressive fire and keep those waves off your fort or friends.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.weapon2: That sniper tower you built isn’t just for looking pretty. Get out there and pick off those Husks from long range with the Bullseye.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.weapon3: When a Smasher is closing in, you’ll want the Crusader at your side to make short work of it at close range.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.weapon4: Sometimes you just need a trusty piece of steel at your side to slice through all the Storm’s most persistent enemies.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.weapons.weapon5: Floor spikes are great for Husk crowd control at choke points you’ve built throughout your fort.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.title: Team Up
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.hero1.name: Soldier
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.hero1.desc: The Soldier is your first line of defense. Pass out bullet snacks and send the Husks to nap time.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.hero2.name: Constructor
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.hero2.desc: The Constructor specializes in building forts that are Husk-resistant and easy on the eye. Constructors can buff structures and repair them more quickly than other heroes
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.hero3.name: Outlander
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.hero3.desc: The Outlander is the best at finding all the ingredients you need to craft your towering forts and things that go boom.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.hero4.name: Ninja
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.hero4.desc: The Ninja is fleet of foot, slices through any combat situation, and is the only one who played enough video games to master the double jump.
messages.epic.fortnite.at.explore.team.enemies.de: The Husk and other monsters that emerged from the Storm are more than mindless zombies. They’ll go over, around, and through the defenses you’ve built. You need to be smart and adaptable to stop them.
messages.epic.fortnite.leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
messages.epic.fortnite.mobile.title: iOS Invite Event
messages.epic.fortnite.mobile.findDescription: If so, then we can find your progress and purchases.

messages.epic.fortnite.mobile.importantInfo: IMPORTANT: Select the platform you've played Fortnite on before to retain your account details, such as your progression level, name and any purchases.
messages.epic.fortnite.mobile.noAccount: An Epic Games account is required but your login method is not linked to an existing account. Please try a different login method or create an Epic Games account.
